org.apache.avalon.meta.info.builder
Interface TypeCreator

All Known Subinterfaces:
TypeFactory
All Known Implementing Classes:
SerializedTypeCreator, XMLLegacyCreator, XMLTypeCreator
public interface TypeCreator

Simple interface used to create Type from stream. This abstraction was primarily created so that the Type could be built from non-XML sources and no XML classes need be in the classpath.

Version:
$Revision: 1.1.1.9 $ $Date: 2004/04/04 13:41:50 $
Author:
Avalon Development Team

Method Summary
 Type createType(String key, InputStream input)
          Create a Type from stream
 

Method Detail

createType

public Type createType(String key,
                       InputStream input)
                throws Exception
Create a Type from stream

Parameters:
key - the name of component type that we are looking up
input - the input stream that the resource is loaded from
Returns:
the newly created Type
Throws:
Exception - if an error occurs
